LaTeX edition

To edit LaTeX, you can type a formula in LaTeX using $$ as delimiter inside the rich editor (not the formula editor).

Then, you can reedit such formula with the formula editor pressing the editor button .

Tip. To edit complex LaTeX formulas, you can first add a simple formula like $$\frac{2}{3}$$ and, then, use the formula editor in the way described before to complete it.
